// Assert that there exists a definition anchor from the protobuf header, but
// none from the source file.
// This file cannot itself be a source file which includes the header as we
// need to test that indexing of the protobuf CU directly indexes transitive
// dependencies.
//- _DeclAnchor=vname(_, "kythe", "bazel-out/bin", "kythe/testdata/indexers/proto/testdata.pb.h", "c++") defines/binding _Decl
//- !{ _DefnAnchor=vname(_, "kythe", "bazel-out/bin", "kythe/testdata/indexers/proto/testdata.pb.cc", "c++") defines/binding _Defn }
